meanings.sent1: She likes to sloganize for her favorite team.
meanings.sent2: Companies often sloganize to attract customers.
meanings.sent3: The parrot learned to sloganize the catchy phrase.
meanings.sent4: Her words sloganize the importance of kindness.
meanings.sent5: The teacher encouraged the students to sloganize their ideas for the project.

meanings.definition: To promote or publicize using slogans.
meanings.sent1: They sloganize their products to increase sales.
meanings.sent2: Politicians often sloganize their campaigns for better reach.
meanings.sent3: The comedian decided to sloganize his jokes for more impact.
meanings.sent4: The artist sloganizes her art to convey powerful messages.
meanings.sent5: The organization sloganizes their mission to raise awareness.
